value.title: Apple: You (Still) Don’t Understand the Vision Pro
value.content: The first live sporting event was broadcast in the Vision Pro, and it's a big disappointment. The experience could be amazing, but Apple actively ruins it.

value.title: 2026.02: AI Power, Now and In 100 Years
value.content: The best Stratechery content from the week of January 5, 2026, including whether AI will replace humans, the future of power generation, and what China thinks of what happened in Caracas.

value.title: An Interview with Jeremie Eliahou Ontiveros and Ajey Pandey About Building Power for AI
value.content: An Interview with Jeremie Eliahou Ontiveros and Ajey Pandey about how AI labs and hyperscalers are leveraging demand to build out entirely new electrical infrastructure for AI.

value.title: Nvidia at CES, Vera Rubin and AI-Native Storage Infrastructure, Alpamayo
value.content: Nvidia's CES announcements didn't have much for consumers, but affects them all the same.
